title.rendered: U.S. Citizens Town Hall Takoradi, October 1st

content.rendered:
The U.S. Embassy in Ghana is pleased to announce that the Honorable Stephanie Sullivan, U.S. Ambassador to Ghana, will be in Takoradi on October 1st to meet with U.S. citizens in the area and to answer questions about U.S. citizen consular-related issues. A U.S. consular officer will also be present to provide notarial services and accept passport renewal applications for adults.

Capacity for the town hall will be limited so please email ACSAccra@state.gov to confirm your interest and/or request more specific information about the location and schedule. In your email please provide your name, passport number, and phone number.

Even if you are unable to join for this event, you can find a wealth of information about U.S. citizen consular services at https://gh.usembassy.gov/u-s-citizen-services/. You may also always email ACSAccra@state.gov or call 030-274-1570 Monday through Thursday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, or Friday from 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM, with questions or concerns and our team will be happy to assist.
